Awesome game !!! The game developers rock, i mean after 19 years we can still play with comfort, not a lot of lagging like other games, new challenges !! Other game developers can surely learn from you guys !!
Кто бы что не говорил, а старая добрая хардкорная кс это то что надо)))
i like dust2 and the smokegranades in middle i know them now i been smoking alot smoking hella mad

it's alright, can run well on a mac book
Game was amazing, then every game had hackers in it, they fixed it for a bit, but then it became F2P and it's back to hackers every game. 0/10

很好玩  这游戏真的舒服

Frustratingly AWESOME and addictive, no other FPS like it, Classic.
I definitely got my money's worth.

Arvostelen vain koska tämä koko ajan kysyy että "suositteletko tätä peliä" mutta voin kertoa että tämä peli on aivan mahtava räiskintä peli ja ilmainen mutta jos otat tosissaan cs go:oun niin kannattaa ostaa prime niin et joudu hackereitten kanssa samaan peliin

заебатая игра,доходишь до двух калашей с венками а потом сливаешся до 2 новы подрят и забиваешь на год скачиваешь и у тебя она начинает тормозить на минималках (40 фпс) при раскидках все 20,советую всем у кого есть желания лешится нервов и сорвать голосовые связки

like it's pretty good if you like skill based games and stuff pre steep learning curve but once youve got the hang of it its like alg theres alot of hackers here and there tho so it aint good on that part oh and if you like spending lots of money on pixels on your screen then this is definitely the game 4 u
Best Game i ever played but Trustfactor isnt that good.
Best FPS game ever i've played. Until now, should be nominated to be the BEST GAME OF THE YEAR in 2019
игра устарел  но если вы тупы дану то можети играть
turned into shit but fun from time to time
Класная игра. Токо читеров много. А так весело. Я люблю умирать от них. Сразу можно огонь развести. Или взорвать дом. Всем советую
Most balanced FPS game of all time.
Just play the god damn game already!

Owned this game since the orange box, and play it since the early half life mod. 

A game i use to kill thousand of hours during my school days, enjoy this game but the problem is cheaters and hackers are really spoiling the fun with those wall hack, back track, aim bot.... the list goes on. Hope they is a way to really rid the place off them.
